#How to install pasta

== Requirements ==

Pasta depends on following modules from CPAN:
  * [http://search.cpan.org/~avif/Time-Duration-1.04/Duration.pm Time::Duration]
  * [http://search.cpan.org/~abw/Template-Toolkit-2.19/ Template Toolkit]
  * [http://search.cpan.org/~geoffr/Text-VimColor-0.11/lib/Text/VimColor.pm Text::VimColor]

These need to be installed.

== Installation ==

Put the program into a directory where pl-scripts can be executed from apache. Make pastes directory writeable to everyone (chmod a+rwX pastes).

Edit conf.pm to fit your needs.

== Example Apache2 config ==

Following is the Apache2 VirtualHost clause I use to get the program running, with short paste urls:
{{{
<VirtualHost *>
        DocumentRoot /home/dagur/www/pasta
        ServerName pasta.dagur.com
        Options +ExecCGI
        ErrorLog /var/log/apache2/pasta.error.log
        LogLevel warn
        CustomLog /var/log/apache2/pasta.access.log combined
        ServerSignature On
        RewriteEngine on
        RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
        RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
        RewriteRule ^(.*)p/(.*).css$ /$2.css [R]
        RewriteRule ^(.*)p/(.*)$ /view.pl?p=$2 [L,QSA]
</VirtualHost>
}}}
